title: Topic 001 Question 006
body: You use a multiple step Cloud Build pipeline to build and deploy your application to Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE). You want to integrate with a third-party monitoring platform by performing a HTTP POST of the build information to a webhook. You want to minimize the development effort. What should you do?
options: Add logic to each Cloud Build step to HTTP POST the build information to a webhook.
Add a new step at the end of the pipeline in Cloud Build to HTTP POST the build information to a webhook.
Use Stackdriver Logging to create a logs-based metric from the Cloud Build logs. Create an Alert with a Webhook notification type.
Create a Cloud Pub/Sub push subscription to the Cloud Build cloud-builds PubSub topic to HTTP POST the build information to a webhook.
